TopicTitle: Game crashes after a few minutes

Articles.Content:
Hello

I just downloaded the windows 1.1 Version of KSP and wanted to try most of the mod collection that I used on linux (64bit). I can start the game and fly a rocket or two but after 5-15 minutes the game crashes with the windows error "KSP stopped working". I cannot give any instructions on how to reproduce this issue, because it happens random (sometimes in the vab, sometimes on scene changes).

Here is my output.log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BziCDYez7CzlTGlYYjNGT3JIX1U/view?usp=sharing

And my system:

i7 6700k

32GB Memory

Radeon R9 390 with 8GB graphics memory

Hope you can help
I fixed it by removing scatterer from my game. for some reason it seemed to cause the crashes
